mapper.insert: insert into block_score (block_id, parent_id, average, grossing, dehydrate, embedding, sectioning, staining, sealing, note, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time,type) values (#{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{average,jdbcType=REAL}, #{grossing,jdbcType=REAL}, #{dehydrate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{embedding,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sectioning,jdbcType=REAL}, #{staining,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sealing,jdbcType=REAL}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), now(),#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update block_score set average = #{average,jdbcType=REAL}, grossing = #{grossing,jdbcType=REAL}, dehydrate = #{dehydrate,jdbcType=REAL}, embedding = #{embedding,jdbcType=REAL}, sectioning = #{sectioning,jdbcType=REAL}, staining = #{staining,jdbcType=REAL}, sealing = #{sealing,jdbcType=REAL}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = now() where block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND type=#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select block_id, parent_id, average, grossing, dehydrate, embedding, sectioning, staining, sealing, note, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time,type from block_score where block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select block_id, parent_id, average, grossing, dehydrate, embedding, sectioning, staining, sealing, note, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time,type from block_score

select block_id, parent_id, average, grossing, dehydrate, embedding, sectioning, staining, sealing, note, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time,type from block_score where block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND type= #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
